comment.body:
Upon reading this, first I was wondering if I should run a proxy myself. But thinking a bit further, it is a very bad idea to use a proxy for ZeroNet. You fully trust the proxy owner with all your data. You cannot even be sure it is a real ZeroNet proxy you are connecting to. (And of course, it is totally against the ZeroNet's idea of decentralization.) 

I believe there is no other sane way than running ZeroNet yourself (probably using Tor).
